name: Popcorn
overview: Time is running low and there are so many popcorn kernels yet to go! You must gather them all in order to move to the next level. Make sure to avoid the fish! Basically Pacman, but with a vertically-scrolling isometric-perspective maze, only one enemy per stage, no power pills, but many other bonuses and bonus systems. Also: Really garish graphics! Would it have killed me to use a more desaturated palette?
